about_the_game:
Cakefoot is an ultra hard, single-button, minimalist avoid 'em up, inspired by classics such as The World's Hardest Game, Geometry Dash, Flappy Bird, Super Hexagon, Kuru Kuru Kururin, Ralph 4, and The Cat That Got the Milk.



Hurtling hazards bombard your path as you guide a living slice of cake along a curving line through space.



Simple to learn, impossible to master, hold the button to move the cake forward, let go to move back, and the cake will respond with natural physics. If you can navigate the most challenging enemy patterns you've ever seen all the way to the end, you'll be rewarded with -- a new, harder difficulty 😈



Take a break from the epic 22-level quest and register a score in arcade mode ⏰



CAKE is just the beginning -- beat the game and collect all the coins to unlock BEEF CAKE, BUFFALO BEEF CAKE, and even visual effects, MIRROR and WARPED.



  • Unique game play mechanic: dodge 'em up on rails
  • 22-level Quest Mode
  • Arcade mode
  • Modular enemy types that combine into endless patterns
  • Progress saves automatically
  • Unlock new difficulty levels and visual effects by collecting challenge coins
  • Runs on Windows, Mac, Linux at 60 FPS in any resolution
  • Supports mouse, keyboard, and gamepad
  • Can run fullscreen, and can be displayed on any monitor in a multi-monitor setup
  • Dynamically resize the window to any dimension
  • Simple JSON syntax for creating and sharing new levels and skins
  • Modifiable source code

✨ ✨
detailed_description:
Cakefoot is an ultra hard, single-button, minimalist avoid 'em up, inspired by classics such as The World's Hardest Game, Geometry Dash, Flappy Bird, Super Hexagon, Kuru Kuru Kururin, Ralph 4, and The Cat That Got the Milk.



Hurtling hazards bombard your path as you guide a living slice of cake along a curving line through space.



Simple to learn, impossible to master, hold the button to move the cake forward, let go to move back, and the cake will respond with natural physics. If you can navigate the most challenging enemy patterns you've ever seen all the way to the end, you'll be rewarded with -- a new, harder difficulty 😈



Take a break from the epic 22-level quest and register a score in arcade mode ⏰



CAKE is just the beginning -- beat the game and collect all the coins to unlock BEEF CAKE, BUFFALO BEEF CAKE, and even visual effects, MIRROR and WARPED.

  • 22-level Quest Mode

  • Modular enemy types that combine into endless patterns

  • Unlock new difficulty levels and visual effects by collecting challenge coins

legal_notice:
• Streaming and monetization of streams is permitted
  • Distribution and monetization of mods is permitted

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Ubuntu 18.04 or equivalent distro with glibc 2.27 or higher
  • Processor: x86_64
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 75 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 3.2 or higher

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.3 (Big Sur) or greater
  • Processor: Apple Silicon (arm64) or Intel (x86_64)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 3.2 or higher

name: Cakefoot

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher (32 or 64 bit)
  • Processor: Dual core or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or better
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 3.2 or higher

reviews:
“hair-pulling rage type gameplay that only a game like this could produce”
Fusion R Gamer

“surprisingly addictive, and hard-as-hell”

“This MF piece of cake”
Games under 1GB
short_description: Fork it up! Cakefoot is a challenging, single-button dodge ’em up on rails. Pilot a walking cake – hold to accelerate, let go to drift back – and survive against all odds. Featuring 22 epic levels, arcade mode, unlockables, and high scores, Cakefoot is endlessly replayable, and impossible to defeat.
